item.title: What Is Tallow Balm? Ingredients, Uses, and Benefits
item.description: What Is Tallow Balm? Tallow balm is a natural, deeply moisturizing skin balm made from beef tallow. It’s packed with nutrients that help repair and hydrate the skin. Unlike commercial creams filled with synthetic ingredients, tallow balm NZ is simple—just pure, skin-loving fats that support healthy skin. What Is Tallow Balm Made Of? The main ingredient in tallow balm is beef tallow, which comes from high-quality, grass-fed suet (the firm fat around the kidneys).
